name: Asteroid Squad
description:
ASTEROID SQUAD 

Asteroid Squad is a game where you select a spaceship and a pilot to explore a flock on asteroids in search for resources, but the place is filled with autonomous ships and space creatures that will hunt you down!! Prepare for a frenetic action and compeling gameplay of ASTEROID SQUAD!!!

CREDITS
